text: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Albert Einstein'>]

text: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='J.K. Rowling'>]

text: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Albert Einstein'>]

text: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Jane Austen'>]

text: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Marilyn Monroe'>]

text: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Albert Einstein'>]

text: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='André Gide'>]

text: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Thomas A. Edison'>]

text: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Eleanor Roosevelt'>]

text: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
author: [<Selector query="descendant-or-self::span/descendant-or-self::*/small[@class and contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' author ')]/text()" data='Steve Martin'>]
